description.zh-cn: 香港及台湾创作男歌手、音乐制作人及演员。1990年代最具影响力的华语歌手之一，有「国民歌王」、「台湾四大天王」、香港「天王杀手」之誉。
description.en: Hong Kong and Taiwanese singer-songwriter, music producer, and actor. One of the most influential Mandopop singers of the 1990s, known as the 'National King of Songs', one of the 'Four Heavenly Kings of Taiwan', and the 'Heavenly King Killer' in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 周华健的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Wakin Chau.

description.zh-cn: 周华健的儿子。
description.en: Son of Wakin Chau.

description.zh-cn: 周华健的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Wakin Chau.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的综合性研究型公立大学。
description.en: A national public research university in Taipei, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 周华健曾就读的小学。
description.en: The primary school Wakin Chau attended.

description.zh-cn: 周华健曾就读的中学。
description.en: The secondary school Wakin Chau attended.

description.zh-cn: 台湾大型唱片公司，周华健所属的唱片公司。
description.en: A major Taiwanese record label to which Wakin Chau is signed.

description.zh-cn: 台湾音乐制作人、词曲作家、歌手。
description.en: Taiwanese record producer, songwriter, and singer.

description.zh-cn: 台湾女歌手。
description.en: Taiwanese female singer.

description.zh-cn: 由周华健成立的音乐工作室。
description.en: A music studio founded by Wakin Chau.

description.zh-cn: 由罗大佑、李宗盛、周华健、张震岳组成的台湾乐团。
description.en: A Taiwanese band formed by Lo Ta-yu, Jonathan Lee, Wakin Chau, and Chang Chen-yue.

description.zh-cn: 台湾创作歌手、音乐家。
description.en: Taiwanese singer-songwriter and musician.

description.zh-cn: 台湾创作歌手。
description.en: Taiwanese singer-songwriter.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡音乐人，周华健的制作班底成员。
description.en: Singaporean musician and a member of Wakin Chau's production team.

description.zh-cn: 香港新闻主播，曾是周华健的小学老师。
description.en: Hong Kong news anchor, formerly Wakin Chau's primary school teacher.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影导演，周华健的中学同班同学。
description.en: Hong Kong film director and a high school classmate of Wakin Chau.

description.zh-cn: 香港歌手、演员，对周华健的音乐生涯产生影响。
description.en: Hong Kong singer and actor who influenced Wakin Chau's music career.

description.zh-cn: 香港乐队，对周华健的音乐生涯产生影响。
description.en: A Hong Kong band that influenced Wakin Chau's music career.

description.zh-cn: 香港歌手，对周华健的音乐生涯产生影响。
description.en: Hong Kong singer who influenced Wakin Chau's music career.

description.zh-cn: 台湾歌手、演员，曾与周华健多次合作。
description.en: Taiwanese singer and actor who has collaborated with Wakin Chau multiple times.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港中西区，是周华健的出生地。
description.en: An area in the Central and Western District of Hong Kong, and the birthplace of Wakin Chau.

description.zh-cn: 香港演员、导演、歌手，与周华健有多次合作。
description.en: Hong Kong actor, director, and singer who has collaborated with Wakin Chau on multiple occasions.

description.zh-cn: 考入国立台湾大学数学系，后肄业。
description.en: Admitted to the Department of Mathematics at National Taiwan University, but did not complete the degree.

description.zh-cn: 1986年在李宗盛推荐下进入滚石唱片担任制作助理，后成为旗下歌手。
description.en: In 1986, under the recommendation of Jonathan Lee, he joined Rock Records as a production assistant and later became a signed artist.

description.zh-cn: 赏识并推荐周华健进入滚石唱片。
description.en: Recognized Wakin Chau's talent and recommended him to join Rock Records.

description.zh-cn: 经由齐豫引荐，周华健结识作曲家陈扬，开始了广告歌曲的演唱生涯。
description.en: Through Chyi Yu's introduction, Wakin Chau met composer Chen Yang and began his career singing for commercials.

description.zh-cn: 2003年，新加坡音乐人黄韵仁加入周华健的制作班底。
description.en: In 2003, Singaporean musician Eric Ng joined Wakin Chau's production team.

description.zh-cn: 周华健就读广悦堂鲁班学校时，曾受其老师苏凌峰教导。
description.en: When Wakin Chau was studying at Kwong Yuet Tong Lo Pan School, he was taught by his teacher So Ling Fung.

description.zh-cn: 两人为新法书院中学同班同学。
description.en: They were classmates at New Method College.

description.zh-cn: 周华健深受许冠杰等70年代粤语歌手影响而迷上音乐。
description.en: Wakin Chau was deeply influenced by 1970s Cantonese singers like Sam Hui, which led to his passion for music.

description.zh-cn: 周华健深受温拿乐队等70年代粤语歌手影响而迷上音乐。
description.en: Wakin Chau was deeply influenced by 1970s Cantonese bands like The Wynners, which led to his passion for music.

description.zh-cn: 周华健深受罗文等70年代粤语歌手影响而迷上音乐。
description.en: Wakin Chau was deeply influenced by 1970s Cantonese singers like Roman Tam, which led to his passion for music.

description.zh-cn: 两人曾多次合作，包括合唱歌曲《别傻了》(2003)，并在央视春晚同台(2019)，任贤齐也曾担任周华健演唱会嘉宾(2016)。
description.en: They have collaborated multiple times, including the duet 'Bie Sha Le' (2003), a joint performance at the CCTV Spring Festival Gala (2019), and Richie Jen being a guest at Wakin Chau's concert (2016).

description.zh-cn: 两人曾多次合作，周华健曾为成龙电影《我是谁》制作并演唱主题曲(1997)，并担任其演唱会嘉宾。
description.en: They have collaborated multiple times. Wakin Chau produced and sang the theme song for Jackie Chan's movie 'Who Am I?' (1997) and has been a guest performer at his concerts.
